title: 356: Be a Hoe and Find a Husband!
itunes:title: 356: Be a Hoe and Find a Husband!
description:
…or be a “sleaze” and find a spouse, etc etc - you get it! The Broads are joined today by the amazing Matchmaker Maria! They chat about Maria being a 3rd generation matchmaker and what that looks like today, how much dating has changed in the last 3 years, conversations to have before marriage and how to have them, the benefits of couples therapy, ignoring pink flags, Maria’s “12 Date Rule”, why texting doesn’t count as a date, choosing a f*ck buddy, the need to meet their friends, communicating your needs to avoid confusion, online dating fatigue, common dating profile mistakes and tips, and much more! 

 

MATCHMAKER MARIA (Maria Avgitidis Pyrgiotakis):

Follower her on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/matchmakermaria/

Agape Match/Coaching/Online Profile Photoshoots/More!: https://linktr.ee/matchmakermaria

Listen to her podcast “Ask a Matchmaker”: https://plinkhq.com/i/1521530338?to=page

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

***LUMINEUX: Get 15% off your order today by going to GETLUMINEUX.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY

***PILL CLUB: Go to THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY - they are offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient!

***VEGAMOUR: Go to VEGAMOUR.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to save 20%!

***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILLITY.COM/CHATTY 

***FIRSTLEAF WINE CLUB: Get 6 bottles of wine for $29.95 and free shipping at TRYFIRSTLEAF.COM/CHATTY 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
